featured.text: According to the passage, which of the following is TRUE about tea preparation? (A) Black tea leaves need to be picked on a cloudy day.

definition.zh_def: 多雲的，指天空中有許多雲的狀態。
definition.en_def: Having many clouds in the sky; overcast.
definition.example: It was a cloudy day, perfect for staying indoors and reading a book.
